dmca.title: Curacao Tourism Board Copyright Infringement Claim
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Keith Leslie [mailto:Keith.Leslie@avenuea-razorfish.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, April 13, 2005 10:33 AM
To: Legal Response; copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: JHepple@CTDB.NET
Subject: RE: Curacao Tourism Board Copyright Infringement Claim


Please find attached, a revised letter of complaint, I will fax the signed
version of this document shortly.  I believe this satisfies all 6 of the
criteria stated on your web site.  The signed fax should satisfy item #1.
Thank you.
 
 
 
Keith J. Leslie  |  Technology Director  |  direct 954 689 9747  |  mobile
954 610 2968  | fax 501 639 6982   AvenueA-Razorfish
<http://www.avenuea.com/media/home/aa-rflogo.gif> 

 

  _____  

From: Legal Response [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, April 13, 2005 11:09 AM
To: Keith Leslie; 'Legal Response'; copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: JHepple@CTDB.NET
Subject: RE: Curacao Tourism Board Copyright Infringement Claim


Please consult the section of the statute that was referenced in our
response. The required notice elements are clearly stated.

  _____  

From: Keith Leslie [mailto:Keith.Leslie@avenuea-razorfish.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 11, 2005 11:50 PM
To: Legal Response; copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: JHepple@CTDB.NET
Subject: RE: Curacao Tourism Board Copyright Infringement Claim


In which respects?
 
Keith J. Leslie  |  Technology Director  |  direct 954 689 9747  |  mobile
954 610 2968  | fax 501 639 6982   AvenueA-Razorfish
<http://www.avenuea.com/media/home/aa-rflogo.gif> 

 

  _____  

From: Legal Response [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 12, 2005 12:46 AM
To: Keith Leslie; copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: JHepple@CTDB.NET
Subject: RE: Curacao Tourism Board Copyright Infringement Claim


Please note that your notice did not comply with the notice provisions of
512(c)(3)(A) of the DMCA.
 
Legal Response Team
The Planet
 

  _____  

From: Keith Leslie [mailto:Keith.Leslie@avenuea-razorfish.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 11, 2005 9:52 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: JHepple@CTDB.NET
Subject: Curacao Tourism Board Copyright Infringement Claim


Mr. Crosby,
 
What is the status of our claim?  We submitted our claim in compliance with
the procedures outlined on your website.  I emailed an electronic version of
the document as well as faxed a version with my signature on it, acting on
the behalf of my client, the Curacao Tourism Board.  Please, at your
earliest convencience, can you please provide me with an update as to where
our claim stands?  Thank You.
 
Yours,
 
 
Keith J. Leslie
 
Keith J. Leslie  |  Technology Director  |  direct 954 689 9747  |  mobile
954 610 2968  | fax 501 639 6982   AvenueA-Razorfish
<http://www.avenuea.com/media/home/aa-rflogo.gif>
